member.name: MFNetCredentialRequirements
member.summary: Specifies how the credential manager should obtain user credentials.

member.name: MFNetCredentialRequirements.REQUIRE_PROMPT
member.summary: The credential manager should prompt the user to provide the credentials.

summary.para: The credentials are saved to persistent storage. This flag acts as a hint for the application's UI. If the application prompts the user for credentials, the UI can indicate that the credentials have already been saved.
